Package stocks.model

Class BuyByWeights<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • stocks.model.BuyByWeights<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - transaction list of the portfolio after all buy transactions are executed.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    PortfolioOperation<T>
    public class BuyByWeights<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements PortfolioOperation<T>
    Implements the PortfolioOperation interface and allows the user to bulk purchase multiple stocks in a single transaction on a specific date.

      Allows the user to bulk purchase multiple stocks in a single transaction on a specific date.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BuyByWeights

        public BuyByWeights​(java.lang.String tickerList,
                    java.lang.String weightList,
                    java.lang.String date,
                    double total,
                    double commission,
                    java.util.List<TransactionItem> transactions)
        Allows the user to bulk purchase multiple stocks in a single transaction on a specific date.
        Parameters:
        tickerList - Stock ticker list to be purchased.
        weightList - Weight distribution of the stocks to be purchased that sum upto 100%.
        date - Date of Purchase of the stock.
        total - The total amount for which the transaction is executed.
        commission - Commission for the transaction.
        transactions - List of transactions performed in this portfolio.
